title: Increasing MS does not fight inflation

content.question: An inflationary gap can be eliminated by all of the following EXCEPT

choices.label: an increase in personal income taxes
an increase in the money supply

content.answer: an increase in the money supply

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
